Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Rickshaw
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
A mode of human-powered transport by which a runner draws a two-wheeled cart which seats another person. Not very comfortable, at least for one of them...

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Passenger x1

<color=#bb8f04>Human-powered:</color> Driver will get 50% more tired and hungry while driving this vehicle.
